metadata.title: CVE-2017-2622 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An accessibility flaw was found in the OpenStack Workflow (mistral) servicewhere a service log directory was improperly made world readable. Amalicious system user could exploit this flaw to access sensitiveinformation.

criterions.comment: mistral package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
